duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact with clients and provide an elevated client experience.
Use Saks Fifth Avenue services and tools to obtain and grow business.
Utilize knowledge to offer personalized assistance and enhance the shopping experience.
Actively collaborate and contribute to a positive and inclusive team dynamic.
Constantly look for opportunities to improve the way things are done.
Demonstrate comfort in flexing all communication styles and establish positive interpersonal relationships.
Learn and utilize online clienteling tools and software, and use social media and technology.
Focus on achieving and exceeding individual cosmetic sales goals, event sales goals, and department daily & monthly sales goals.
Provide a dynamic service presence to each location.
Use appropriate questions to identify a client’s needs in order to provide guidance or directions.
Actively participate on social media to grow personal brand and business.
Demonstrate professional make-up and treatment consultation and application.
Maintain a consistent high level of service by creating and developing excellent client relationships.
Cross sell beyond one line to drive results and build client loyalty.
Be thoroughly knowledgeable on all in-store services and offer the appropriate service to further personalize and enhance the shopping experience.
Maintain counter standards by ensuring a clean, tidy, and welcoming space.
